column5: Just got in from morning of sledding. Jeez, its chilly here in Toronto. Hills are icy downtown, from back of the house.     If this cold keeps up should be decent ice on Quinte or Cooks bay next weekend.  cheers,  ehg
Bickford park, one park south of Christie Pits, Lew. Those hills are pure ice not packing snow. Fast and fun.  Looking forward to some ice fishing soon.  cheers,  ehg
My grandmother lived just north of the Pits Eric, and I spent ALOT of time around those hills back in the day.  Thanks for the memories !!
